title: Dark elven boots

**Dark elven boots** are a type of [boots](/wiki/Boots "Boots") that appear in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). They are [magical](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item") boots made of [spider silk](/wiki/Spider_silk "Spider silk"), and have a [randomized appearance](/wiki/Randomized_appearance "Randomized appearance") when [unidentified](/wiki/Identification "Identification").

## Generation

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") characters start the game with knowledge of dark elven boots' randomized appearance.

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(monster_attribute\) "Drow (monster attribute)") [mercenaries](/wiki/Mercenaries "Mercenaries") have a 1⁄2 chance of [generating with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") dark elven boots that count for 2 points of their target generation [AC](/wiki/AC "AC"), while other non-[undead](/wiki/Undead "Undead") drow have a 1⁄6 chance of generating with dark elven boots.

## Description

While worn, dark elven boots grant 2 base AC and [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth"). Drow gain a bonus point of AC while wearing dark elven boots, and can safely enchant them to +7.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Dark_elven_boots\&action=edit)*

Dark elven boots

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
[         
dark elven boots
Appearance random
Slot boots
AC 2
Special
  • stealth
Base price 16 zm
Weight 15
Material spider silk

Dark elven boots are a type of boots that appear in EvilHack. They are magical boots made of spider silk, and have a randomized appearance when unidentified.

Generation

Drow characters start the game with knowledge of dark elven boots' randomized appearance.

Drow mercenaries have a 1⁄2 chance of generating with dark elven boots that count for 2 points of their target generation AC, while other non-undead drow have a 1⁄6 chance of generating with dark elven boots.

Description

While worn, dark elven boots grant 2 base AC and stealth. Drow gain a bonus point of AC while wearing dark elven boots, and can safely enchant them to +7.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
